<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Invisibility Cloak](/Spells.aspx?ID=1903)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=735" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 388 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You become invisible, with the same restrictions as the 2nd-rank [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) spell.

---
**Heightened (6th)** The duration increases to 10 minutes.

**Heightened (8th)** The duration increases to 1 hour.
name: Invisibility Cloak
